name: stopthespread
description: This is a website for Coronavirus

scripts.usemin: usemin aboutus.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/aboutus.html && usemin faq.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/faq.html && usemin index.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/index.html && usemin guidelines.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/guidelines.html && usemin news.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/news.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run imagemin && npm run copyfonts && npm run usemin
